title: Introduction to HTML
content: HTML is a markup language used to structure content on the web.

title: CSS Basics
content: CSS is used for styling and layout of web pages.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals
content: JavaScript is a versatile programming language for adding interactivity to websites.

title: Version Control with Git
content: Git is a distributed version control system for tracking changes in code.

title: Responsive Web Design
content: Learn how to create websites that work well on all devices and screen sizes.

title: Frontend Frameworks: React
content: React is a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

title: CSS Preprocessors: SASS and LESS
content: SASS and LESS are CSS preprocessors that add features like variables and nesting.

title: Web Performance Optimization
content: Learn techniques to optimize the performance of your web applications.

title: Backend Development with Node.js
content: Node.js allows you to build server-side applications using JavaScript.

title: Database Management with MongoDB
content: MongoDB is a popular NoSQL database for storing and retrieving data.
